ModMetaData.name: Solar Powered Ceiling Light
ModMetaData.author: k2ymg
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds two lights.
1 - Soler powered ceiling light.
2 - Soler powered lamp post.


Both lights works standalone without connect to power net but not work well in bad weather or winter season.

Sorry, because I have not a paint skill, 1 is have't image, 2 is same as (broken) ancient lamp post.

If you want to disable 'breakable', put my mod after this.
